mapper.insert: insert into s_workday(workday) select soss.workday from soss_workday soss where soss.workday >= DATE_ADD(curdate(),INTERVAL 1 DAY) and not exists( select '' from s_workday s where soss.workday = s.workday )

insert into s_workday_spot(workday) select soss.workday from soss_workday soss where soss.workday >= DATE_ADD(curdate(),INTERVAL 1 DAY) and not exists( select '' from s_workday_spot s where soss.workday = s.workday )

insert into s_workday_unnormal(workday) select soss.workday from soss_workday soss where soss.workday >= DATE_ADD(curdate(),INTERVAL 1 DAY) and not exists( select '' from s_workday_unnormal s where soss.workday = s.workday )
mapper.delete: delete from s_workday where workday >= DATE_ADD(curdate(),INTERVAL 1 DAY)
delete from s_workday_spot where workday >= DATE_ADD(curdate(),INTERVAL 1 DAY)
delete from s_workday_unnormal where workday >= DATE_ADD(curdate(),INTERVAL 1 DAY)
